sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM RN , SUB1.LIC_GRP_ID , SUB1.JEN_ID , SUB1.JEN_NM , SUB1.JEN_USR_ID , SUB1.JEN_USR_TOK , SUB1.JEN_URL , SUB1.JOB_ID , SUB1.JOB_RESTORE_ID , SUB1.JOB_TOK , SUB1.JOB_TYPE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00002', SUB1.JOB_TYPE_CD, '1') AS JOB_TYPE_NM , SUB1.JOB_PARAMETER , SUB1.JOB_DESC , SUB1.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', SUB1.USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM , SUB1.REG_DTM , SUB1.REG_USR_ID , SUB1.REG_USR_IP , SUB1.MODIFY_DTM , SUB1.MODIFY_USR_ID , SUB1.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.JEN_ID , B.JEN_NM , B.JEN_USR_ID , B.JEN_USR_TOK , B.JEN_URL , A.JOB_ID , A.JOB_RESTORE_ID , A.JOB_TOK , A.JOB_TYPE_CD , A.JOB_PARAMETER , A.JOB_DESC , A.USE_CD , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM STM9001 A LEFT JOIN STM9000 B ON(A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.DEL_CD = '02' ) SUB1 WHERE 1=1
AND EXISTS ( SELECT Z.* FROM STM9002 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.LIC_GRP_ID = SUB1.LIC_GRP_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = SUB1.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = SUB1.JOB_ID AND Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# )
AND SUB1.JEN_ID = #jenId#
AND SUB1.USE_CD = #useCd#
AND SUB1.JOB_TYPE_CD = #jobTypeCd#
AND SUB1.JEN_NM like '%'|| UPPER(#searchTargetData#) ||'%'
AND UPPER( SUB1.JOB_ID ) like '%'|| UPPER(#searchTargetData#) ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_DESC like '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUB1.USE_CD = #searchTargetData#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY SUB1.REG_DTM DESC
sqlMap.select:
SELECT SUB2.* FROM (
) SUB2 WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM STM9001 WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId# AND JOB_ID = #jobId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT SUB2.* FROM (
) SUB2 WHERE 1=1 AND SUB2.JOB_ID = #jobId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO STM9001 ( LIC_GRP_ID, JEN_ID, JOB_ID, JOB_RESTORE_ID , JOB_TOK, JOB_TYPE_CD, JOB_PARAMETER, JOB_DESC, USE_CD , REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #licGrpId#, #jenId#, #jobId#, #jobRestoreId# , #jobTok#, #jobTypeCd#, #jobParameter#, #jobDesc#, #useCd# , SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STM9001 SET JEN_ID = #jenId# , JOB_ID = #jobId# , JOB_RESTORE_ID = #jobRestoreId# , JOB_TOK = #jobTok# , JOB_TYPE_CD = #jobTypeCd# , JOB_PARAMETER = #jobParameter# , JOB_DESC = #jobDesc# , USE_CD = #useCd# , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId# AND JOB_ID = #jobId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM STM9001 A WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId# AND JOB_ID = #jobId# AND ROWNUM = 1
sqlMap.update: UPDATE STM9001 SET JOB_RESTORE_ID = null WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND JEN_ID = #jenId# AND JOB_RESTORE_ID = #jobId#
